commit message: Initial directory structure.
Initial import
AppView now shows sortable packet count per app
Iptables Log tab now displays log entries
Byte counting and timestamps added
LogView autoscrolls
Now adds iptables rules on app start
Added iptable rules for most, hopefully all, cell and wifi interfaces
Added sorting by bytes and sorting by timestamp
App tab now shows full timestamp
Added list of unique address:port to apps tab
Filter out device IP from list of addrs on app tab
Run all superuser commands as a script to avoid multiple Superuser pop-ups; improved ShellCommand a bit
Force updating App UI on sort by adding/removing item from list
Publishing to market
Corrected sorting of timestamps in appview; limit number of items in log list to prevent running out of memory
Load AppView at the same time as LogView; set default sort to Bytes; tweaked use of ShellCommand; todo: fix orientation switching
Kill log tracker on destroy; improvements to logging
Added missing IptablesLogData and MyLog source, progressing on fixing orientation change issue
added some minor comments
Trying to rename iptables-log to iptableslog
Trying to rename iptables-log to iptableslog
Fixed saving/restoring data on app state change; load app icons on background thread to speed up start-up
Removed unnecessary qualifier
Updated icon and tab graphics

- significant optimizations of core logic and layouts
- replaced nested LinearLayouts with RelativeLayout
- cache log entries in a buffer and update list views on ui thread once a second instead immediately on new log entry
- use binary search when looking for app to update
- renamed 'Unspecified' entry to 'Kernel'
- add linux and root icons
- app sort menu now sets checked on current sort method
- minor refactor of sort code
- improved logcat logging statements
- added missing project/ant properties files
- replaced log view automatic scrolling with TRANSCRIPT_MODE_NORMAL
(view won't automatically scroll unless user is at bottom of list)
- use fast scroll thumb to allow quicker scrolling through large lists
- limit log entries in log view to last 15,000 entries
- log and apps are both filterable by hardware keyboard (filter menu item coming soon for those lacking a hardware keyboard)
Updated manifest version info
set sleep time-outs to more responsive values

Converted some static variables to non-static
Improved handling of orientation/state change
Rewrote initialization to run on background thread
Added progress dialog during application loading stage
Icon loading background thread refreshes UI every 2 seconds to display icons
Icon loading thread refreshes UI at end of loading to display icons
Added Settings/shared preferences initial framework
Added more menu items (not all active yet -- only Sort, Settings and Exit)
Added Settings/Preferences screen (mostly mock-up of checkboxes at this point -- only Sort works)
Sort-by saved to shared preferences
Confirm app exit (LogTracker soon to be converted to foreground service)

Implemented more settings options:
* Reset data menu item
* pre-sort option for sorting app view
* logcat output toggle
* max log entries for log tab

Added 'intial sort' setting which sets how the apps list is sorted on initial display (by name or uid, defaults to name)
Added advanced filtering options for apps tab (coming soon to log tab)
Advanced filtering options item in preferences menu now works
Filter now affects log view; misc clean-ups
Log tab filtering now survives orientation/state changes
Apps tab addresses list now filters by address/port
keeps track of packets/bytes/timestamp for each unique host, differentiating sent/received

Filter supports comma-separation for multiple keywords
Log tab refreshes missing icons when icon loading completes
Touched-up preferences screen
Added 'Coming soon' dialogs to unimplemented preference items
Enabled log tracker buffering (needs testing)

Ports resolve to known service names preference implemented
Update log tab after icons refresh

Fix log tab port filter case-sensitivity issue
Trim whitespace from filter constraints
Significantly improve readability of apps tab data
Removed icons from tabs for more data viewing area
Added 'Reset' and 'Help' buttons to filter dialog

Added support for exclusion filter, using exclaimation mark (Log tab only, so far)

(Need to scrap current filter system and replace with system that maintains checkboxes
individually for each filter keyword, this commit will soon be obsoleted by a better
filtering system.)
Added pause button to prevent filters/sort from interfering with output during intensive network use; disabled buffering until it can be reviewed; misc polishing
Apps tab resolves ports
App tab caches address view for quicker scrolling

Resolve hosts setting implemented
Improved tab headers style

Removed pause menu item
Fixed app view filtering (still needs new filtering system replacement)

Added graph library
On-click listener for log tab items brings up graph with pseudo-data -- progress!
Display shell-command output if debugging enabled

Rudimentary app address graph timeline implemented; polish and improvement coming soon.
Rewrite ShellCommand to use BufferedReader for built-in line-buffering to avoid missing data
Update apps tab every 5 seconds to reduce flicker/cpu
Improved display of graphs; fixed concurrent issue with host info

Added exclude filter option
Misc filter logic improvements
Set default filter checkboxes to unchecked
Clicking on app in app tab opens graph
Graph optimizations (to be completed next revision)
Update log tab every 2.5 seconds to decrease cpu (increased from 750ms)
Obtain and filter against all local ip addresses

Corrected packet tracking logic flaw; adds missing uids to netstat mapping if uid is known
Apps tab now properly displays remote addresses instead of local ip addresses

Overall apps timeline graph implemented
Individual app per-connection graph implemented
Graph interval and viewsize adjustable in reasonable scales from menu
Update manifest

Graph interval and viewsize save to preferences.
Implemented interval and viewsize preference entries.
Updated manifest to 0.6.0; reuse on-click listener for graph preference

Converted IptablesLogTracker to service
Added start-at-boot (not yet implemented), start-at-app-start, start-at-app-exit service preferences
Manual start/stop service menu item
Todo: save service variables on orientation change; start-at-boot; read historical data on start-up

Added status text at top of tabs
Status text shows if service is running, filters set, logfile size
Rebind service on orientation change
Reformatted sources

Added preference option for how much history to load on app start
(changing history size preference reloads data within time-range selected)
Loads history on app start
Optimize history loading
Performance optimization: load timestamp strings as-needed
Corrected timestamp sort order; list refreshes after sort

Load 1 hour of history by default instead of 15 mins
Cancelable progress bar for history loading (todo: survive state/orientation change)
Removed start-service-at-boot option for this release; add for next
Notification updates with logfile size

Cancelable progress bar for history loading now survives configuration changes
Renamed Utils to HistoryLoader and moved timestamp stuff to Timestamp class

Resolve hosts on background thread
Optimize LogView updating of resolved hosts
Exit warning message more verbose about logging state
iptableslog.sh script moved to internal storage
App tab most recent timestamp text now updates again
Increased log tab entries default max to 150,000
Option to trim history logfile in preferences (not yet implemented)
Progress on converting app tab to expandable list view; phasing out uniqueHostsList and Html.fromHtml bottlenecks

Converted apps tab to expandable list view
No more costly building of unique hosts list
No more costly giant Html.fromHtml for host info
Memory optimization: resolve address/ports/timestamps as-needed
Polish apps tab views

Added click/long click listeners to open timeline graphs on apps tab
Performance/memory optimization: Load app labels and icons as-needed on background threads
Toast notification of graph loading (large graphs may take a while to load)

Apps tab now filters again
Added 4 days, and 2 weeks to time ranges
Load all app labels at app start again (but not icons)

Parse IN/OUT interface to track interface used, as well as whether packet was sent or received
(instead of local IP address info, as current local IP addr may not be same as historical addrs)
Show interface on log tab entries (todo: filter by interface)
Release 0.7.0 with minor things deferred to 0.7.1
Error checking for bad commands (i.e., missing root or iptables)
Minor clean-up of previous commit
Always show interface on log tab entries

Do not start service at app start by default
Don't start service sticky (don't relaunch after unexpected kill)
Resume current instance from notification instead of launching new instance
Correct service binding/unbinding behavior
Remove confirm exit dialog when using exit menu item
Bump revision
Memory optimizations
Implemented option to start at boot
Optimize 'Stop logging' behavior
Implemented StringPool class to conserve String allocations

Memory and CPU optimizations
Optimize out need for binary search in getItemByAppUid if last index is still current
Replaced majority of split calls with indexOf/substring
Wrap expensive MyLog string-concatenated calls with if-enabled check
Use 8Kb buffer when reading history, instead of potentially gigantic buffer
Removed unneeded debug statement
Oops, last update broke start-at-boot -- fixed
Fix 'Start at app-start' option

Minor text-change 'Start at app-start' --> 'Start log at app-start', etc, in preferences
Remove remaining references to 'iptableslog'

Memory optimization
Use StringPool to remove yet more duplicate strings

Performance optimizations -- now runs faster and uses less battery!
History loads at least 40% faster (depending on IO speeds)
Don't create uid string and name lower-casing until needed
Get uid string directly from StringPool when possible to avoid valueOf() calls
Cache lowercased names in StringPool to avoid toLowerCase() calls
Replace instances of toLowerCase() in tight loops with StringPool.getLowerCase()
Replace pool.size() with StringPool.size field
StringPool now checks pool size only on additions
Setting max log entries now takes effect immediately
Cache max log entries value in Settings instead of always retrieving from prefs
Show apps tab by default

Clean-ups in preparation for ViewPager view-swiping for 2.0 release
Added android-support-v4.jar
Move settings initialization to loadSettings()
Remove pause-output code
Remove logging statements from graph loading
Move status text to layout xml instead of code

Convert from TabHost/TabActivity to ViewPager/FragmentActivity
Convert Log/Apps tab to Fragments
Implement AppCache to significantly speed-up app loading

Fixed sort menu item and back button
Todo: fix orientation/configuration change issues

Fix orientation/configuration change issues
Remove ViewPagerIndicator auto-generated files from check-in
Fix possible FC during filtering

Added spinners for interval/viewsize

Implement onItemClickListener and toggle checkbox/graph series

Improve specific-app timeline interface

Graph improvement: sort legend by visible graph data

Improve graph pinch-zoom behavior (thanks thinksoft)

Include date in graph X-axis label

Initial commit
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/github/master'
Updated README.md
Updated README.md: Add spaces between images
Update .gitignore: ignore backup files
Update .gitignore: ignore logs and keystore

Add system users to application list (media, shell, adb, etc)
Log history loading duration
Attempt to fix possible null-pointer exception related to NetworkLog.setting potential race-condition
Add support for more network interfaces

Add option to toggle service foreground state
(hide/show service notification in status bar)
Remove references to max log size

Check for root/superuser access before starting logging
Display dialog if no root/superuser access detected
Properly get external storage path instead of assuming /sdcard
Bump version to 2.4
Updated manifest: drop support for 1.6 and earlier; add support for 3.0 and later
Support Android 1.6 again
Minor refactor of setting/updating sort values

Improve pinch-zoom (don't jump scroll position after zooming)
Bump minSdk to 5 (dropping support for Donut 1.6) *
* Required to support multiple pointer motion events
Adjust graph scroll seekbar position better

Add ActionBarSherlock 4.1.0 library project
Bump minSdk to 7 (Eclair 2.1)
Bump project target to 15 (ICS 4.0.3)
Remove obsolete Service.setForeground(boolean) method

Integrate ActionBarSherlock into app
Remove application title-bar when displaying service error dialogs
Remove obsolete activity configuration retain instance code for AppFragment/LogFragment
Changes not significant enough to warrant 3.0 release; prepare instead for 2.5 release
Minor clean-up of previous commit
Improve preferences layout

Graphs update viewsize spinner when pinch-zooming
Refactor OverallTimelineGraph and AppTimelineGraph to extend from GraphActivity
Remember graph zoom and scroll on orientation/configuration change
Added OnScaleChangeListener and OnScrollChangeListener classes to GraphView
Update .gitignore: ignore vim .swp files
Add and use internal implementations of iptables and busybox
Bump version to 2.5
Updated README.md: new screenshots; doesn't require iptables/busybox binaries any longer

Fixed: graph interval/viewsize spinners stop working after pinch-zooming
Bump version to 2.5.1
Add envsetup.sh convenience utility script and .vimrc settings
Correct jdb recursion in envsetup.sh
Add MPL 2.0 License

Graph views now properly update when pinch-zooming, setting interval/viewsize, scrolling, and toggling series
Added gitorious to envsetup.sh
Add start/stop logging toggle button to top actionbar

Remember graph viewsize in preferences after pinch-zooming
Bump default history loading size from 1 hour to 4 hours
Bump default interval from 1 second to 5 minutes for better overview of data
Bump default viewsize from 15 minutes to 4 hours

Add 'Copy Source IP', 'Copy Dest IP' and 'Show Graph' to context menu for log tab
Correct minor cast exception related to AppTimelineGraph

Add 'Copy IP Address' and 'Show Graph' to context menu for app tab
Copying IP addresses now copies resolved address/port if resolving is enabled in preferences
Add preference for copying original unresolved addresses/ports to clipboard
Fix filtering by app uid and app name on apps tab
Dump version to 2.6.0 for release to market
Fix potential race-condition crash related to getInstalledApps initialization
Use older android.text.ClipboardManager API to support older devices

Remove 'Start Logging' from menu in favor of new toggle button
Remove @SuppressWarnings line above import that caused compilation error
Fix apps tab resetting data on orientation change

Add 'Confirm exit' option to preferences
Add 'Do not show this again' checkbox to 'Confirm exit' dialog

Fix possible null pointer exception in log view updater
Refactor appUpdater/logUpdater start-up
Move appUpdater/logUpdater start-up to onCreateView to ensure they start on orientation change
Fix possible null-pointer exception preparing options menu with sort option

Fix start logging on boot for newer devices
Improve detection and handling of external storage mounting

Added option to clear log entries older than X timestamp to menu and preferences
TODO: checkbox for deleting entries from logfile currently unimplemented

'Clear log' optimizations:
Exit LogFragment's clearLogEntriesOlderThan() removal loop at first entry >= timestamp
Reuse LogEntry object in AppFragment's rebuildLogEntries()

Implement checkbox for deleting entries from logfile in 'Clear log' dialog with addition of progress dialog
Create LogfileLoader class for reading entries from logfile (eliminates code-repetition between HistoryLoader and ClearLog)
Minor String concatenation optimizations using StringBuilder instead of the + operator
Add DoNotRefresh methods to LogFragment and AppFragment for use while loading history to prevent excessive adapter refreshes
Slightly optimize caching method of maxLogEntries
Remove need to pass context to NetworkLog.updateStatusText()
Minor code beautification/cleap-ups
Optimize clearing logfile -- no need to parse each entry, just slurp and splat the chunks

Fix LogFragment filter exclude-by-uid logic
Remove empty apps in AppFragment exclusion filter only if matched
Add sanity check to stop LogFragment and AppFragment updaters if they exist when starting new ones
Update README.md replacing 'viewsize' with 'graphs'

New FastParser class optimizes logfile loading -- now 22% faster!
Fix early abortion of logfile loading due to long lines from malformed entries

Add link to jfastparser/Parser.java source that inspired NetworkLog/FastParser.java
Minor whitespace fix
Wrap more MyLog.d() calls inside loops with if(MyLog.enabled) checks to avoid unnecessary StringBuilder allocations

Significantly optimize logfile loading times by caching String allocations in FastParser.getString()
Add charPool to StringPool for caching char[] -> String conversion allocations

Refactor StringPool a little bit
Fix CharPool binary search logic so it no longer thinks substrings are valid matches
No longer add CharPool new additions to main StringPool
All pools now clear and rebuild when they reach their limits

Sorting StringPool's charPool turned out to be too expensive in terms of memory allocations
Replaced Collections.sort() with AA Tree of CharArray -> String
Created CharArry class to ecapsulate a char[]
Adapted Mark Weiss's AATree class to work with CharArray -> String
Add get(CharArray chars) method to StringPool
Add MPL license boilerplate

Graphs now build series from LogFragment's listData (applies filtering, less RAM use)
Save graph series instance data when changing orientation (quicker orientation changes, less CPU use)

(Upcoming commit will remove AppFragment aggregation of PacketGraphItems for significant RAM savings.)
Ignore annoying GoogleAnalyticsTracker logcat spam

Significant performance and RAM usage optimizations
AppFragment no longer aggregates graph packets (significant RAM improvement)
LogFragment and AppFragment filtering optimizations
LogFragment now tests each new log entry against filter instead of filtering entire list (significant CPU improvement)
Convert LogFragment listData to LinkedList for more efficient pruning when maxLogEntries is reached
Improve logfile loading time significantly by adding new entries only to LogFragment and then rebuilding AppFragment after all entries have loaded
Fix AppFragment host/port filtering
Removed unnecessary filtering on LogFragment create view

Improve UI responsiveness while loading icons/resolving IP addresses by setting
a needsRefresh flag instead of actually refreshing adapters, so that the
adapters refresh at intervals -- prevents flooding with rapid sequential
refreshes and thus consumes less CPU resources.

Optimize loading of application icons for smoother scrolling
- add package map for quicker look-up of app by package name
- add icon loading placeholder image
- icons now fade in when loading
- no longer need to refresh adapters when icon loads
Selecting option to 'Load all history' now works again
Fix legend showing wrong address
Fix icons sometimes not loading
LogFragment now uses AppEntry reference to hold app information instead of its own fields
Don't automatically clean before every build
Make icon placeholder image a little bit darker

Refactor icon loading
Cache icons in ApplicationsTracker.iconMap instead of AppEntries
Android 2.x doesn't support setDrawableByLayerId, refactor loading icons again
Update images in README.md

Fix apps tab not sorting data after updates
Removed some recently added debugging messages

Use NetworkLog.handler instead of getActivity.runOnUiThread()
Removed some recently added debugging messages
Update version to 2.7.1
Fix possible null pointer exception in CharArray.append(String)
LogFragment now properly refreshes after clearing log entries
FastParser can now set position to parse arbitrary locations

Allocate Connections ArrayList just once on class instantiation instead of at every getConnections() call
Wrap debugging output with if-debugging-enabled checks to avoid processing when disabled
Add Integer->String map to StringPool to optimize Integer->String parsing

Optimize parseResult by replacing tons of String.substring() calls with FastParser.getX()
Allocate NetStat object once at class instantiation instead of at every initEntriesMap() call
Fix possible null pointer exception due to race condition not instantiating appFragment.sortBy in time for NetworkLog.onPrepareOptionsMenu()
Return '' instead of null when not reading any characters in getString()

Update netstat map if uids do not match
Fix off-by-one oops when setting parser
Restore default uid value to -1
Optimize comparisons such that compareTo() is invoked only once

Refactor CharArray to use value/offset/length semantics similiar to String
Allow char[] value to be set to reference an external char[] value

Optimize away need to copy char[] value into CharArray by using new CharArray.setValue() semantics
Synchronize access to charBuffer
Fix issue with duplicated IP addresses appearing in Apps tab
Update version to 2.7.2
